title: iPhone xs images are leaked
content: www.9to5am.com gets iPhone XS images that show a 5.8 inch and 6.5 inch screen with amazing OLED display. Checkout the link below

title: Samsung J4 and J6 launch
content: www.gsmarena.com says that Samsung is getting ready to launch J6 and J7 in India over this weekend

title: Google Pixel 3/3XL
content: Google is all set to release their latest mobile phones Google Pixel 3 and 3XL from T-Mobile

title: Moto launches 2 more Android Phones
content: Motorola has been on a success spree with its range of Android phones and they are releasing 2 more this week. The Moto One and the Moto Power One. They will run on Android One
